item.description:
RSVP at http://www.efactor.com/webinarsales1212#

We all know that in business, sales is the key to success. Join us for this FREE webinar that will show you how to develop a sales strategy and set up successful marketing campaigns. We will also talk about how you should train, reward, and manage your sales team!

We will cover:

* Tips & tricks to sales success

* How to develop your sales strategy

* How to support sales with marketing and more

group.name: Boston Web Design (and Dev) Meetup Group

item.name: WEBINAR: No Sales, No Glory
